Pre-Game Insights: India look like they mean business this year and made a positive start to the campaign with two wins in as many games so far as they sit at the top of Group A.
The weekend's result in New York also comes as a good news for USA, who now only need a win from their final two games to confirm Super Eight qualification.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game takes place at Nassau International Cricket Stadium on Long Island, New York, about 30 miles east of downtown Manhattan, with both India and USA set to play all of their group matches at venues in the United States.
Others: The highly-anticipated contest between India and USA will be held on Wednesday, June 12, 2024.
India and USA square off in Group A of the Men's T20 World Cup on Wednesday, with the encounter getting under way at 10:30 a.m. local time (ET) in New York.
